description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 2/28/2006

Stephanie tries to convince Brooke one last time not to marry Ridge.  Meanwhile, Bridget tells Nick that their marriage cannot go on, because she knows that he is still in love with Brooke.  Bridget tries to get Nick to crash Brooke’s wedding before it’s too late.  Everyone arrives for Brooke and Ridge’s wedding and agree that the wedding seems to be rushed.
captions: bold and beautiful 4755 126 2006
